name: OpportuneJobs.com
tag_list: jaspalshakya, ajayshakya, jobs, internships, volunteering, fellowships, consultancy, events, ngojobs, socialenterprisesjobs
overview:
OpportuneJobs.com is about matching ability with opportunity.

A one stop portal for Jobs, Fellowship, Internship, Volunteering, Consultancy, RFP, EOI, Tender, Events and News, OpportuneJobs.com acts as a bridge connecting individuals and organizations.

We also help organizations in finding the right talent through our dedicated Recruitment solutions and Head Hunting services. We also help NGOs and Social Entreprises in their eMarketing (SEO, Social media marketing, eMail marketing, Facebook page design and marketing) efforts.

Sectors Focussed: Agriculture, CSR, Ecotourism/ Rural Tourism, Education, Environment & Natural Resource Mgmt., Fair Trade, Health & Sanitation, ICT, Livelihoods, Microfinance, Renewable Energy, Rural BPO, Rural Finance, Rural Retail

Major Clients: Ashoka India, Chaitanya, Ennovent, Fair Trade Forum- India, FWWB India, IFEN (ICFAI University Group), IMaCS, PACS, Sambodhi Research & Communications Pvt. Ltd., Sambodhi Research & Management Institute, Villgro

external_links.title: Featured in Bizxchange.net, a Times Group initiative
